skills.name: FLAME
desc: • Deals true damage to all enemies.
• 65% Chance to inflict Flame for 2 turns.
• Flame deals true damage over time with a chance to remove beneficial effects each turn.

skills.name: TORCH
desc: • Deals magic damage to a single target.
• 75% Chance to grant Regen HP to all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: MEDITATE
desc: Raise MAGIC and MR of all allies for 2 turns at the start of battle.
